DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this trial is to determine the efficacy and safety of linaclotide administered to patients with chronic idiopathic constipation (CIC). The primary efficacy parameter is the percentage of patients in each dosing group that meet the protocol definition for Complete Spontaneous Bowel Movement (CSBM) Overall Responder.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Linaclotide in Patients With Chronic Idiopathic Constipation
